con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-redeemVoucher-Monetary
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests positiv test-case for redeem monetary voucher
test base is documentation: svn://svn.sg.de.pri.o2.com/DealerPortal/DirectRecharge/trunk/SRs/SD34/ST_TD_SD34_DRC_ASAD_Oleg.doc

con:elements.con:expectedValue: OCS10-BalanceManagement.rechargeAccount: Return response for request with msisdn ${#TestCase#MSISDN}
Piranha-StackService.getStackDetails: Return response for request with MSISDN: ${#TestCase#MSISDN}
